item.title: About
item.description: Hello stranger, I hope you enjoy your stay I’m Andrew McLean and I currently work as an SDET at the MathWorks in Cambridge, UK. This is mostly a blog for my investigations into the ugly parts of the languages I use day-to-day, i.

item.title: JavaScript Horrorshow: Arrays
item.description: An Education: JavaScript is a weird language. Since I apparently now write it professionally, I’ve spent the last little while trying to tease out its grisly secrets and understand them.
